1346 Connecticut Ave
Washington 6. D« C*
I, the undersigned member of the Board of Directors of the national
Association of Educational Broadcasters, hereby agree that the following
resolution shall be made a part of the official record and minutes of the
meeting of said Board of Directors held in Washington, D. C», October
22 - 23, 1961.
"RESOLVED: That Harold E. Hill, the Administrative Vice President of the
Rational Association of Educational Broadcasters, is authorized and
instructed to open a deposit account for and in the name of this corpor-
ation with The Rational Bank of Washington, to deposit therein funds
of the corporation and that said account may be drawn on only by checks
signed in the name of this corporation by the Administrative Vice President,
until further notice in writing to The Rational Bank of Washington, and
The Rational Bank of Washington shall not be required, in any case, i©
make inquiry respecting the application of any instrument executed in
virtue of this resolution or of the proceeds therefrom, nor be under any
obligation to see to the application of such instrument or proceeds»"
3igned_
HEHs&bt
December 27, 1961
